message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a steal at $120. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal for its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $80 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $120 is already a very competitive price. How about we meet in the middle at $105? This would allow me to make a fair profit while still offering you a good deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to pay more than $80 for the product. Could we possibly meet somewhere in the middle?
